Name: Every Flavor Bell-less Crab Challenge
Description: When you take the bell off the Bell Crab, do you steam it, roast it, or... turn it into something special?
QuestDesc: When you take the bell off the Bell Crab, do you steam it, roast it, or... turn it into something special?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello there! Have you ever tried "Every Flavor Bell-less Crab" before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've actually tried it? Wow, that makes you a real hero!

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a dish made with Bell-less Crabs! I think anyone who's brave enough to eat that is a true hero!

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eugene says he wants to be a great hero, so I told him he needs to pass the "Every Flavor Bell-less Crab" test.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But since we don't know how to cook it, Eugene's not becoming a hero any time soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So much for becoming a hero...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excuse me, but do you know where we can try that dish? We can pay for it!

Options.PlotLineKey: I can find it for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? Thank you so much, {Male=mister;Female=miss}. We'll wait for you here until you're back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take your time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How did it go, {Male=mister;Female=miss}? Did you find the dish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on, Eugene. Try it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder what this "Every Flavor Bell-less Crab" tastes like. I hope it's not like raw Sunfish...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It might taste like a Gooberstar. Come on then!

Options.PlotLineKey: It tastes like a Bell-less Crab.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah?! That sounds fishy...

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh... Sounds like it'll be pretty chewy...

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That doesn't really answer the question...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just eat it already, Eugene!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I can't do it. I don't want to be a hero no more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, no, you don't, Eugene! You said you wanted to be a hero!

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph, Eugene's such a chicken. But I've got an idea!

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's try it first. We'll show him how good it is and then he'll want to try it too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The children stare at you with anticipation as you take a bite of the "Every Flavor Bell-less Crab."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You taste the fresh flavors of the sea, salty and slightly fishy. Overall, it's quite enjoyable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How is it? What does it taste like?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, I'll try it then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sarah hesitates for a moment before finally taking a big bite.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... It's not bad, you know. It tastes like the sea!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you sure? Let me have a bite...

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good... N-not good... Good again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You and Sarah watch as Eugene makes funny faces while chewing, but in the end, he finishes his bite. He's a hero now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eugene
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... That was delicious. Thank you, now I'm a hero!

Options.PlotLineKey: Don't go too hard at once.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sarah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you very much, {Male=mister;Female=miss}! Take these. You made Eugene's dreams of becoming a hero come true!
